title: Welcome to the Hall …
text:
Paul Church / The Courier-Tribune From staff reports 
ASHEBORO — Despite Friday night’s Mid-Piedmont Conference varsity football game between Asheboro and Southwestern Randolph High School being moved to Monday due to wet weather, AHS still held its Hall of Fame ceremony Friday evening. The individual inductees (left to right) were Darrell Rich, Tina Brannon, David Couch, David White, Keione Covington and Jim Dollyhigh. Members of the 1950 football team also were honored. The game will be played Monday night at 6:30 p.m. at Lee J. Stone Stadium. Wheatmore’s game at Thomasville also was postponed and will be played Monday at 7 p.m.
